rules_text:
Choose a creature type as Temple of the Old Dynasty enters.
Creatures of the chosen type cost {R}{G} less to cast.
special_text:
[i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)[/i]
I – Create a 2/2 red and green Viashino creature token with “When this creature attacks, it explores.”
II – Until end of turn, creature spells you cast cost {R}{G} less to cast.
III – Mill four cards.
